sqls.sql: select distinct c.wkp_no, d.wkp_name, a.wkc_no, a.wkc_name, case when b.worker_wkc_id is null or b.worker_wkc_id = '' then false else true end as is_selected from pd_wkc a left join mes_worker_wkc b on a.wkc_no = b.wkc_no left join pd_wkp_wkc c on a.wkc_no = c.wkc_no left join pd_wkp d on c.wkp_no = d.wkp_no where a.wkc_status = '110' and b.worker_wkc_id is null or b.worker_no like @worker_no order by is_selected, c.wkp_no, a.wkc_no;

delete from mes_worker_wkc where worker_no = @worker_no; insert into mes_worker_wkc (worker_wkc_status_no, worker_wkc_status_name, worker_no, wkp_no, wkp_name, wkc_no, wkc_name, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host) select '310', '已确认', d.worker_no, c.wkp_no, c.wkp_name, a.wkc_no, a.wkc_name, now(), d.worker_id, d.worker_no, d.worker_name, 'Server', now(), d.worker_id, d.worker_no, d.worker_name, 'Server' from pd_wkc a left join pd_wkp_wkc b on a.wkc_no = b.wkc_no left join pd_wkp c on b.wkp_no = c.wkp_no left join me_worker d on d.worker_no = @worker_no where a.wkc_no =any (@wkc_no);

select distinct a.wkp_no, a.wkp_name, a.wkc_no, a.wkc_name, b.wka_no, b.wka_name, case when c.worker_partake_tmp_id is null or c.worker_partake_tmp_id = '' then false else true end as is_selected from mes_worker_wkc a left join pd_wkc_wka b on a.wkc_no = b.wkc_id left join me_worker_partake_tmp c on b.wka_no = c.wka_no and c.worker_no = a.worker_no where a.worker_no = @worker_no order by a.wkp_no, a.wkc_no, b.wka_no;

delete from me_worker_partake_tmp where worker_no = @worker_no; insert into me_worker_partake_tmp (worker_no, worker_name, wkp_no, wkp_name, wkc_no, wkc_name, wka_no, wka_name, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host) select d.worker_no, d.worker_name, c.wkp_no, c.wkp_name, c.wkc_no, c.wkc_name, a.wka_no, a.wka_name, now(), d.worker_id, d.worker_no, d.worker_name, 'Server', now(), d.worker_id, d.worker_no, d.worker_name, 'Server' from pd_wkc_wka a inner join pd_wkc b on a.wkc_id = b.wkc_no inner join mes_worker_wkc c on b.wkc_no = c.wkc_no and c.worker_no = @worker_no inner join me_worker d on c.worker_no = d.worker_no where d.worker_status = '110' and c.worker_wkc_status_no = '310' and b.wkc_status = '110' and c.worker_no = @worker_no and a.wka_no=any(@wka_no);

select distinct d.wka_no, d.wka_name, case when e.wkn_aps_qty is null or e.wkn_aps_qty <= 0 then 0 else e.wkn_aps_qty end as has_finished, a.mo_qty- ( case when e.wkn_aps_qty is null then 0 else e.wkn_aps_qty end) as not_finished, a.mo_no, a.part_no, a.part_name, a.part_spec, a.mo_qty, a.mo_hope_start_datetime, a.mo_hope_end_datetime, a.mo_desc, a.factory_no, a.client_name, a.mo_rmk01, a.mo_rmk02, a.mo_rmk03, a.mo_rmk04, a.mo_rmk05, a.mo_rmk06, a.mo_rmk07, a.mo_rmk08, a.mo_rmk09, a.mo_rmk10, a.mo_rmk11, a.mo_rmk12, a.mo_rmk13, a.mo_rmk14, a.mo_rmk15, a.mo_rmk16, a.mo_rmk17, a.mo_rmk18, a.mo_rmk19, a.mo_rmk20, case when f.mo_no is null or f.mo_no = '' then false else true end as is_selected from mo a inner join mo_rmb b on a.mo_no = b.mo_no inner join mo_rmb_wkc c on b.unode = c.unode inner join me_worker_partake_tmp d on d.wkc_no = c.wkc_no inner join mo_rmb_aps e on c.unode = e.unode left join mes_wka_mo f on f.wka_no = d.wka_no and f.mo_no = a.mo_no where a.mo_status = '310' and (a.order_no1 is null or a.order_no1 = '') and d.worker_no = @worker_no order by d.wka_no, a.mo_no;
